title: Pavlova (cake)
summary: Pavlova is a meringue-based dessert named after the Russian ballerina Anna Pavlova.[1] It has a crisp crust and soft, light inside, usually topped with fruit and whipped cream.[2] The name is pronounced /pævˈloʊvə/, or like the name of the dancer, which was /ˈpɑːvləvə/.[3][4][5]
